::Dragonfly::

"It's a pleasure met you, madam" said Dragonfly with his most 
polite's tone like he shke his hand "My master Darkfate recieved too 
the transmission and like he it's a bit busy findout the way how 
annoy a lizard, I'm afraid that he couldn't come here and send 
me "and looking  at his followers two males and one femme"to give a 
hand to new comers... nd like he doesn't have any thing against you 
and your team, we cn work together this time"
